dcterms:creator: S. Kuratsubo
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of Fourier series of the indicator function of a D-dimensional ball, which is analyzed for pointwise convergence.
dcterms:title: Fourier series of the indicator function of D-dimensional ball

dcterms:creator: D. Yarotsky
dcterms:description: This dataset includes ReLU network approximations and provides error bounds for these approximations.
dcterms:title: ReLU network approximations

dcterms:creator: J. Schmidt-Hieber
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for nonparametric regression tasks utilizing deep neural networks with ReLU activation functions.
dcterms:title: Nonparametric regression using deep neural networks with ReLU activation function

dcterms:creator: S. Hayakawa
T. Suzuki
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the minimax optimality and superiority of deep neural network learning over sparse parameter spaces.
dcterms:title: Minimax optimality and superiority of deep neural network learning
